text: @holly_cummins @Purity_Birir @hot_girl_spring @monkchips @edeandrea Although I can imagine this also works the other way around. The amount of times I’ve heard people say “and then this guy with a suit came in… *eyeroll*… well then you know right?!”. I think it’s even harder for girls but I think it’s really about the non confirming tech look😣

author.name: INACTIVE - Simone De Gijt @de_gijt@nerdculture.de
author.description: Crazy about scuba diving and diving into code! 🐋🤓 And very passionate about creating a world where everybody can be themselves! 🌈 she/her
